misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a celebrated figure from Keimola Golf, brings a wealth of experience to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Known for his composed demeanor, Timo has become an icon in the golfing world, especially noted as an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.

With eight past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Timo has consistently demonstrated his skill and passion for the sport. A three-time winner of the Hector Trophée, he is known for his strategic play and ability to perform under pressure. Although he has yet to secure an individual Victor trophy, his contributions to his pairs have been invaluable.

Although Timo is not expected to participate in the Hector Trophée 2025, his presence is always felt. His influence extends beyond the course, inspiring many with his dedication. Should he decide to join at the last minute, it would be a welcome surprise to see Timo compete once more.
